name: Forest Game (lag1999)
description:
Forest Game is a 2D platformer where the player controls a researcher, Oslac, who explores the Selva forest. On repeated visits, the player notices gradual changes to the environment as a result of deforestation.

The game was created for my Master of Art project at University of Connecticut for Digital Media and Design! Unity and the Corgi Engine were used for the game's creation. Visuals are inspired by the Amazon Rainforest which itself is being affected by deforestation. 

Game Length:

10-20 minutes

I hope you enjoy the Forest Game! :)
